biobakery-workflows
===================

# Available modules


The overview below shows which biobakery-workflows installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using biobakery-workflows, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load biobakery-workflows/3.1-foss-2022a
```
